snippet: Georgia quarterback Aaron Murray announced on Twitter that he would return for his senior season rather than enter the N.F.L. draft.
abstract: Georgia quarterback Aaron Murray announces on Twitter that he will return for his senior season rather than enter NFL draft.
lead_paragraph: Georgia quarterback Aaron Murray announced on Twitter that he would return for his senior season rather than enter the N.F.L. draft.

headline.main: Murray Staying at Georgia for Senior Season
